name: Haus, the blacksmith
text: Ah, another adventurer wanderin' into my shop. What do ya need, eh? Lookin' to get that rust bucket you call a sword fixed, or are you just here to bask in the glory of my fine craftsmanship? Don't have all day, so spit it out!

name: Haus, the blacksmith
text: Listen here, hotshot. Sarah's just a little girl, and if you got any funny ideas, you'll be meetin' the business end of my hammer real quick. Now, how about we stick to talkin' about armor and weapons, eh?

name: Haus, the blacksmith
text: Back again, I see. What is it this time? Need some ironwork done or just here to test my patience? Give me somethin' to work with, will ya?
